text: That's because it isn't connected anymore :smile: HubSpot uses Cloudflare as CDN, it makes literally no sense to configure another one.
Might need some clarification here. By default HubSpot forms create CRM contacts on submission, or update an existing contact if the contact is known.

<@U7SL518D6> Hey sorry I want to build a coded form onto a custom module and was hoping after I submitted that form it would create a lead in the HubSpot crm. I don't have enterprise though only professional

You can do that by using javascript to submit the form to this endpoint. <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form#:~:text=Form%20submissions%20from%20external%20sources,parallel%20your%20custom%20website%20form|https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form#:~:text=Form%20submissions%20from%20external%20sources,parallel%20your%20custom%20website%20form>.
You would need to have the form built in HubSpot to receive the field input but the HTML CSS and JS is fully yours on the front end if you go this method.
Also remember if you custom build the form to account for <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/accessibility|accessibility>.

Thank you so much Jon I am a little new at this stuff but Im trying to get the hang of things. Im going to try it on a test form and once I get that working everything should be fine! Ill keep you updated thanks for the info really appreciate it
